attributes.action: Introduce and implement more facilities and information on health, fitness and nutritional issues for children via promotion in health clubs, schools and GP/ Hospital sites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see an improvement in the facilities and information available for childrenin the U.K.In my opinion it is very important to not only educate children about thier health, fitness and nutritional benefits but to also create facilities and implement ideas and plans to proceed this further and involve thier parents. This can be acheived by introducing more childrens activities in the fitness industry. this an essential route to ensure obesity levels are reduced and help available for those who need it.
